parameters.name: CheckingConfig
parameters.description: The check settings for sample data.

parameters.name: DirectoryPath
parameters.description: The directory in which the template is stored. Slashes (/) are used to separate directory levels. The name of each directory level can be up to 1,024 characters in length. It cannot contain whitespace characters or slashes (/).

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the template. The name can be up to 512 characters in length and can contain digits, letters, and punctuation marks.

parameters.name: VisibleScope
parameters.description:
The applicable scope of the template. Valid values:

*   Tenant: The template is available in all workspaces in the current tenant.
*   Project: The template is available only in the current workspace.
